title: So, I found this fiora's build to be interesting...

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Simply put, she is obviously hacking or doing some exploit, and i thought it should be brought to the worlds attention. This guy is a dick. (or gal, I am not being sexist.)

replies.body:
how is she hacking?  I don't get it.
just because she got elixirs you think she is hacking?
pls explain

> how is she hacking?  I don't get it.
> just because she got elixirs you think she is hacking?
> pls explain

She bought hunters machete and four pots, that's 475 gold. Then she bought both pots, an additional 600 gold.
At level 1 she had 1075g, even though the max is 515 with the masteries. That is a hack or a bug exploit that she knew she was doing.
oh ok, thank you for telling me. :D
Send in a report, or atleast block the names. Chances are, this thread is going to be gone simply because you called someone out.

Well, I did send in a report, however, I don't believe that people should be using exploits like that because it ruins the game for other people. So, even if nothing occurs, I am going for a sort of public shaming.

Well thank you for that, I acted rashly.

Her build + wards +pots + elixirs = 12.3k gold. 

She bought 4800 gold worth of elixirs. 

She earned 8.5k gold that game. 

12.3k -  8.5k = - 3.8k

3800 gold short (and even if my math is wrong...thats a pretty big gold gap)

Her first back was just before 4 minutes and she bought 1120 gold worth of items even tho she had only earned about 650 gold since the game started (taken from champion gold chart)

Also if you look at the player build and cursor over the spirit stone it says 700(17) which means that she only paid 17 gold for it.  BUT even if that was true she should of still be a little short for all the stuff she bought.

Ban da bitch

I don't think the exploit is a gold exploit but rather a double pot purchase exploit.  Otherwise she would have bought more in the future but it's always just the two pots. At least that's what the trend suggests.
Buying to elixers at once makes no difference other than a time refresh though? They don't stack

@SniperPi, you have already noticed that Riot deleted the past post regarding this.  they don't allways comeout and discuss maintenance on their game about bug abuses. they have admited on the forums they don't like when this is discussed too much because its advertising the bug. Just keep profiling that player they will likely be banned soon
I just saw another post with the same person doing the same exploit and still on fiora. That guy is really unlucky to get double forum posts about him.
Most of the naming and shaming thing is because of speculation.  This is obviously a hack, and is viewable by Riot's own match history.
There no names of any kind.
Also found out how to do it, not very hard. It's all thanks the that wonderful refund they put in the game, Thanks Riot.
The question is, does this recap still count items that have been sold back?
Yes, that is displayed with a red x through the item, look on in her build or anyone elses
And the tracker won't care about an item until a person is committed to it, I.E. leaving the store area
